Control Name: Protect devices that capture payment card data via direct physical interaction with the card from tampering and substitution.\n\n Note: These requirements apply to card-reading devices used in card-present transactions (that is, card swipe or dip) at the point of sale. This requirement is not intended to apply to manual key-entry components such as computer keyboards and POS keypads.

control_attributes.Control: Protect devices that capture payment card data via direct physical interaction with the card from tampering and substitution.\n\n Note: These requirements apply to card-reading devices used in card-present transactions (that is, card swipe or dip) at the point of sale. This requirement is not intended to apply to manual key-entry components such as computer keyboards and POS keypads.
control_attributes.Requirement: 9.9. Restrict physical access to cardholder data
